page.title: 09Lloyds and Midland Bank
page.content: On Friday Clare and I went to Midland bank at 10:30 am and Lloyds at 11:30 am.From these interviews we found that the people we interviewed both liked working for the community. Both banks used credit cards,and both used Access.There are no cash dispensers in Blockley and both banks are open on Mondays and Friday mornings from 10:00 am until 12:30 pm.They both have accounts for children.Lloyds has the black horse account and Midland has the Griffin saver account for children. To be a banker you need at least 3 "O"levels being maths ,english and one other.
